creator: vladimir@bossicard.com
text:
/terrainmap[coordinates/top-left/latlong/latitude[(number(text()) + 180)

>= 0] and coordinates/top-left/latlong/longitude[(number(text()) + 90)

<= 0] and coordinates/bottom-right/latlong/latitude[(number(text()) +
180) <= 0] and
coordinates/bottom-right/latlong/longitude[(number(text()) + 90) >=
0]]";

creator: Kevin.Ross@iVerticalLeap.com
text: how about a junit test and a sample document vladimir?

creator: Kevin.Ross@iVerticalLeap.com
text: please provide a test case or kill the bug from the active list.

creator: sterff@in.tum.de
text:
Created attachment 7013
Test Case for this Bug

creator: sterff@in.tum.de
text:
I added a test case with a sample XML that returns a node given the query
mentioned in the Bug. I wasn't able to break the TestCase, using all kind of
onvalid values in the XML.

creator: Kevin.Ross@iVerticalLeap.com
text:
Test committed and integrated into the build.  This unit test proves this works.
 Please add to test case and reopen if you still have problems.

Thanks Alexander.
